forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with periods of rain. Low 11C.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy with rain, windy. Lows overnight in the low 50s.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with rain likely. Low 11C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected. Locally heavy rainfall possible.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with rain likely. Low 52F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected. Locally heavy rainfall possible.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and wind. High 13C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected. Locally heavy rainfall possible.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with rain likely. High near 55F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected. Locally heavy rainfall possible.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with rain early...thunderstorms developing late. Low 11C. Winds S at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with rain...thunderstorms likely by morning. Low 52F. Winds S at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of light rain. High 14C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional light rain. High 56F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Periods of rain early. Low 8C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain...mainly in the evening. Low 46F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 13C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High near 55F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low around 5C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 41F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. High 14C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. High 56F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers. Low 9C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with showers at times. Low 48F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 13C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High near 55F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 9C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing later during the night. Low 47F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 14C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High 57F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 7C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 44F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun early, then becoming cloudy later in the day. High 14C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 57F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. Low 7C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Low around 45F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with showers for the afternoon hours. High 13C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers for the afternoon. High 56F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 49F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 13C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High around 55F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers. Low 8C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with showers at times. Low 47F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
